sqlMap.select: select a.mre_no as mre_no , a.mre_title as mre_title, a.mre_content as mre_content , a.mre_date as mre_date, a.mre_point as mre_point , a.mre_imgpath as mre_imgpath, a.mem_email as mem_email, a.mid_no as mid_no, b.mem_photo as mem_photo from m_review a, member b where a.mem_email = b.mem_email and a.mid_no = #data# and a.mre_title <> '강정인이지웠음' order by 4 desc

select a.sre_no as sre_no , a.sre_title as sre_title, a.sre_content as sre_content , a.sre_date as sre_date, a.sre_point as sre_point , a.sre_imgpath as sre_imgpath, a.mem_email as mem_email, a.stay_no as stay_no, b.mem_photo as mem_photo from s_review a, member b where a.mem_email = b.mem_email and a.stay_no = #data# and a.sre_title <> '강정인이지웠음' order by 4 desc
select * from m_comment where mre_no = #data# order by COM_DATE desc
select * from s_comment where sre_no = #data# order by SCO_DATE desc
sqlMap.insert: insert into m_comment (com_no, com_content, com_date,mre_no,mem_email) values('MC000'||m_comment_seq.nextval, #com_content#, sysdate, #mre_no#,#mem_email#)
insert into s_comment (sco_no, sco_content, sco_date,sre_no,mem_email) values('SC000'||s_comment_seq.nextval, #sco_content#, sysdate, #sre_no#,#mem_email#)
sqlMap.update: update m_comment set com_date = sysdate, com_content = #com_content# where com_no = #com_no#
update m_comment set sco_date = sysdate, sco_content = #sco_content# where sco_no = #sco_no#
